verses.verse: O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, thou art my God <S%H430><s%>; I will exalt <S%H7311><s%> thee <S%H3034><s%>, I will praise thy name <S%H8034><s%>; for thou hast done <S%H6213><s%> wonderful <S%H6382><s%> things <S%H6098><s%>, even counsels of old <S%H7350><s%>, in faithfulness <S%H530><s%> and truth <S%H544><s%>.

For thou hast made <S%H7760><s%> of a city <S%H5892><s%> a heap <S%H1530><s%>, of a fortified <S%H1219><s%> city <S%H7151><s%> a ruin <S%H4654><s%>, a palace <S%H759><s%> of strangers <S%H2114><s%> to be no city <S%H5892><s%>; it shall never <S%H5769><s%> be built <S%H1129><s%>.
Therefore shall a strong <S%H5794><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> glorify <S%H3513><s%> thee <S%H7151><s%>; a city of terrible <S%H6184><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> shall fear thee <S%H3372><s%>.

For thou hast been a stronghold <S%H4581><s%> to the poor <S%H1800><s%>, a stronghold <S%H4581><s%> to the needy <S%H34><s%> in his distress <S%H6862><s%>, a refuge <S%H4268><s%> from the storm <S%H2230><s%>, a shade <S%H6738><s%> from the heat <S%H2721><s%>, when the blast <S%H7307><s%> of the terrible ones <S%H6184><s%> is as a storm <S%H2230><s%> against the wall <S%H7023><s%>.

As the heat <S%H2721><s%> in a dry place <S%H6724><s%> wilt thou bring down <S%H3665><s%> the noise <S%H7588><s%> of strangers <S%H2114><s%>; as the heat <S%H2721><s%> by the shade <S%H6738><s%> of a cloud <S%H5645><s%>, the song <S%H2159><s%> of the terrible ones <S%H6184><s%> shall be brought low <S%H6030><s%>.

And in this mountain <S%H2022><s%> will Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> unto all peoples <S%H5971><s%> a feast <S%H4960><s%> of fat things <S%H8081><s%>, a feast <S%H4960><s%> of wines on the lees <S%H8105><s%>, of fat things <S%H8081><s%> full of marrow <S%H4229><s%>, of wines on the lees <S%H8105><s%> well refined <S%H2212><s%>.

And he will destroy <S%H1104><s%> in this mountain <S%H2022><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the covering <S%H3875><s%> that covereth <S%H3874><s%> all peoples <S%H5971><s%>, and the veil <S%H4541><s%> that is spread <S%H5259><s%> over all nations <S%H1471><s%>.

He hath swallowed up <S%H1104><s%> death <S%H4194><s%> for ever <S%H5331><s%>; and the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%> will wipe away <S%H4229><s%> tears <S%H1832><s%> from off all faces <S%H6440><s%>; and the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of his people <S%H5971><s%> will he take away <S%H5493><s%> from off all the earth <S%H776><s%>: for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken it <S%H1696><s%>.

And it shall be said <S%H559><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%>, Lo <S%H430><s%>, this is our God; we have waited <S%H6960><s%> for him <S%H3467><s%>, and he will save us <S%H3068><s%>: this is Jehovah; we have waited <S%H6960><s%> for him <S%H1523><s%>, we will be glad and rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in his salvation <S%H3444><s%>.

For in this mountain <S%H2022><s%> will the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> rest <S%H5117><s%>; and Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall be trodden down <S%H1758><s%> in his place <S%H4963><s%>, even as straw is trodden down <S%H1758><s%> in the water of the dunghill <S%H4087><s%>.

And he shall spread forth <S%H6566><s%> his hands <S%H3027><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> thereof <S%H7811><s%>, as he that swimmeth spreadeth forth <S%H6566><s%> his hands to swim <S%H7811><s%>; but Jehovah will lay low <S%H8213><s%> his pride <S%H1346><s%> together with the craft <S%H698><s%> of his hands <S%H3027><s%>.

And the high <S%H4869><s%> fortress <S%H4013><s%> of thy walls <S%H2346><s%> hath he brought down <S%H7817><s%>, laid low <S%H8213><s%>, and brought <S%H5060><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>, even to the dust <S%H6083><s%>.
